recovery_events.task_description: Create a new slash command /fake3 that automates 3 iterations of fake code detection and fixing. The command should: 1) Run /fake audit, 2) Fix any issues found, 3) Test the fixes, 4) Update a scratchpad with progress, 5) Repeat for 3 iterations total, 6) Call /learn at the end if any fake code was found. Create the command file in .claude/commands/fake3.md and implement any supporting Python scripts needed. Include comprehensive documentation and examples. Create a PR with all changes.
